10001.QuestDetail: Waking up in a strange inn, there is a letter from a mysterious girl on the table...

10092.QuestDetail: Partnered with Airona, let's explore the Seabreeze Festival together!

10009.QuestDetail: While investigating the Tales of the Plains with Airona, discovered the rumored Snow Knight...

10089.QuestDetail: The defeated monster dropped loot, open it with the gift from Tina.

10095.QuestDetail: Guided by the clue, together with the two girls, you continue to investigate the Void Engram.

10090.QuestDetail: Head to the cliff of the ruins, find clues about the Void Engram.

10088.QuestDetail: The man in black and the Void Engram have disappeared, and the Tales of the Plains are temporarily concluded. It's time to go to the Pioneer Bureau to claim your reward!

10003.QuestDetail: At the Bureau, you met Valeria, who became your guide. Register as an adventurer and set forth on an exciting new journey!

10087.QuestDetail: A new mysterious commission has appeared: search for the Snow Knight thief who stole a diary with Airona. Speaking of Snow Knight, you both think of a certain red-haired girl...

10097.QuestDetail: Tina indeed has clues about the Snow Knight thief. She takes you and Airona to a suspect's hiding alley. So far, the commission is going smoothly, but is that really the case?

10010.QuestDetail: The Man in Black who previously disappeared has reappeared! He is very interested in you and seems to be plotting something.

10099.QuestDetail: Tina, who was eroded by the Void Engram, is missing. Go find her with your companions.

10011.QuestDetail: The Man in Black appears once again, and at the same time, Tina falls into a deeper crisis...

10201.QuestDetail: After the fireworks festival ended, you returned to The Double-Faced Coin and unexpectedly received a mysterious gift...

10202.QuestDetail: Learned a hidden past. Someone's future and fate changed because of it.

10203.QuestDetail: Head to the Artisan Guild to find the secrets of the Medal and the Void Engram.

10204.QuestDetail: The Void Engram outbreak is related to Hruga, but how did the Void Engram end up in the medal? Go with Olvera to the Artisan Guild to investigate.

10205.QuestDetail: The small medal led to a big event. Search with your companions for an organization hidden behind the scenes.

10206.QuestDetail: After the investigation concluded, return to Asterleeds with Airona and enjoy a moment of peace.

10207.QuestDetail: Is the person who destroyed important documents in Asterleeds also related to the Dark Mist Legion? Tina, who is pursuing the criminal, encounters an injured guard saved by a mysterious boy. Ask him what happened.

10208.QuestDetail: Is the person who destroyed important documents in Asterleeds also related to the Dark Mist Legion? Tina, who is pursuing the criminal, encounters an injured guard saved by a mysterious boy. Ask him what happened.

10209.QuestDetail: A boy from Byrnhald, met you at the seaside.

10210.QuestDetail: Tina and Tatta encountered trouble on their way back to Asterleeds and urgently need assistance.

10211.QuestDetail: Head to the second-floor archive room in Ocean Hill to find old stories about the Dark Mist Legion and Jayden.

10212.QuestDetail: After making preparations, leave the city with your companions.

10213.QuestDetail: Follow the clues left by Tina to find the road to the Towering Ruin.

10214.QuestDetail: Use the Imagine Seed at a critical moment. Past events hidden in memory will appear.

10215.QuestDetail: Search for Denvel's traces with your companions, heading to that fortress of silence and calamity.

10302.QuestDetail: That stubborn priest holds the key to dispelling the Void Engram. Discuss countermeasures with your companions.

10303.QuestDetail: There seems to be an anomaly among the Void Units. Investigate their situation carefully.

10304.QuestDetail: Go alone to Minsterhorn to investigate the lightning storm anomaly.

10307.QuestDetail: There seems to be a similar anomaly in the Forest of Monuments. Go assist Airona.

10308.QuestDetail: The forest ranger couple seems to be trapped at the center of the anomaly.....

10309.QuestDetail: Reunite with Tina and Tatta. At the right time, learn Tatta's secret......

10311.QuestName: The paradox of love and hate
10311.QuestDetail: Before falling into a coma, Tatta confessed to you the past he had buried.

10312.QuestDetail: After meeting at the post station, Airona informs everyone of Denvel's true plot.

10313.QuestDetail: Accompany Tina to the Andra Tunnel to search for Engram, but encounter the trapped priest Stanley. He doesn't seem to have a friendly face towards you......

10401.QuestDetail: You and your companions arrive at the tribe of the aliens. Someone left a mysterious message, seemingly guiding you forward...

10403.QuestName: The Roar of Dragon and Wind
10403.QuestDetail: A sudden storm sweeps through the tribe, you and your companions go to investigate.

10404.QuestDetail: After collecting three keys, you finally arrive at the Forbidden Zone's gate. Behind the gate is the sacred relic of Kanamia, also the divine heritage you have been pursuing for a long time.

10601.QuestName: Like Spring Unfolding Her First Rose
10601.QuestDetail: To retrieve the stolen Hruga's Horn, a new adventure begins, but the journey is never without its twists and turns-this time is no exception.

10602.QuestName: In the Moments After Those Dreams
10602.QuestDetail: Airona has fallen into a deep sleep. it's best to rest at a local's home and regain strength.

10603.QuestDetail: Parting ways with the warm-hearted Fafala, return to the journey of searching for the Hruga's Horn. This time, Airona has found new clues.

10604.QuestName: Knocking on Doors That Won't Open
10604.QuestDetail: The place where the so-called "Engram Anomaly" appears seems complicated, and it's hard to venture in recklessly as an adventurer.

10605.QuestName: Suddenly Done Well and Just Right
10605.QuestDetail: The guards at the Sislesa Mines are overly loyal. This path won't work, another way must be found.

10606.QuestName: The Leaking Bell Understood by Someone
10606.QuestDetail: A pickpocket daring enough to steal near the Pillar of Divinity must have extraordinary skills-at least her psychological quality far exceeds that of ordinary people. Even as a prisoner, she has not stopped "working hard."

10607.QuestName: The Night Steps into the Long Street
10607.QuestDetail: Striking a deal with Darya, there's finally a way to enter the heavily guarded Sislesa Mines.

10608.QuestDetail: There were some minor incidents along the way, but successfully infiltrated the Sislesa Mines, and indeed, something is amiss here.

10609.QuestName: Stars tremble and fall into the dust
10609.QuestDetail: The influence of the Illusion Flower cannot be underestimated, and the miners are deeply affected by it. However, unlike the pilgrims, they cannot obtain Star Soul Bottles. Forced by unfair treatment, they close their hearts and do not easily trust outsiders.

10610.QuestDetail: The brutal actions of the Blackstone Legion are deeply infuriating, making it hard to stay calm and detached.

10611.QuestName: Burning dreams of fire in dreams
10611.QuestDetail: Although the weak miners were rescued, Darya seems to be in low spirits.

10612.QuestName: There is a lion hidden in her eyes
10612.QuestDetail: Successfully escaped the mines, avoiding being blocked and surrounded by the Blackstone Legion. This is certainly good, but the investigation has not made progress yet, and more ideas are needed.

19003.QuestDetail: As the investigation deepened, arrived at the scene of the Knighting Ceremony...

19004.QuestDetail: As the investigation deepened, arrived at the scene of the Knighting Ceremony...

20001.QuestDetail: Defeat powerful monsters across the plains to unlock more Talent options.

20003.QuestDetail: Defeat the elite Goblin Crossbow hiding in Ancient City of Vill to further improve yourself.

20005.QuestDetail: Defeat the Void Arachnocrab hiding in the underground district to further improve yourself.

20007.QuestDetail: Defeat the Brigand Guard Captain in the Brigand camp to further improve yourself.

20009.QuestDetail: Defeat the Muku Warrior in the Muku Camp.

20040.QuestName: Grey is the Grey of Lies
20040.QuestDetail: It's detective time! Try to find clues about the contact person.

20041.QuestName: Red is the Red of Eagerness
20041.QuestDetail: You've obtained new clues from the spy Grey Crow, discuss the next steps with Tina.

20042.QuestDetail: Team up with your good partner Tina to uncover the spy's secrets!

20043.QuestName: Purple is the Purple of Melancholy
20043.QuestDetail: A little kid by the roadside called out to you. Listen to what he has to say...

30101.QuestName: The Whereabouts of the Council Candidate
30101.QuestDetail: The council candidate is missing? This is a big deal!

30102.QuestDetail: Griff's caravan and his valuable goods have disappeared, this is not a good sign.

30103.QuestDetail: Someone is buying contraband in Asterleeds market. Find out what's going on.

30104.QuestDetail: A father and daughter seem to be having a heated argument... Go see what's happening.

30105.QuestDetail: There is said to be a severe rat infestation in Port Town... But there seems to be something fishy about it. Try to uncover the truth.

30106.QuestDetail: Poor Bobby was beaten by his fellow scavengers. Try to stop the infighting among the scavengers.

30107.QuestDetail: Adventure and treasure hunting are a man's romance, but abandoning family for it is another matter.

30108.QuestDetail: Camille's grandmother was deceived by someone claiming to be a great witch. Help her out.

30109.QuestDetail:
During my exploration, I unexpectedly saved a scholar researching Ee-chan and Ee-chan who was looking for a partner.
At the scholar's request, I took on the task of assisting in finding Ee-chan's partner.

30110.QuestDetail: While passing through the goblin tribe, I met a father in distress. His son is suspected to have died in the war. Unable to accept it, he hopes to find a definite answer.

30111.QuestDetail: Sophie's sister ran up to the roof and disappeared. Wait, her sister is a cat? No wonder...

30112.QuestDetail: Aven's glasses are broken, and he is having a headache about how to repair the circuits.

30113.QuestDetail: The caravan was attacked by goblins again, protect the caravan through the difficulties.

30114.QuestDetail: Play an exciting game of hide and seek with the children of Minsterhorn!

31010.QuestDetail: Received an invitation letter from the Designers' Guild, go to the fashion general store and talk to Sherry.

31016.QuestDetail: Go to the Artisan Guild to learn about the Epic gear exchange service.

31050.QuestDetail: Find Harvey to learn about Gear Refinement.

31051.QuestDetail: In the journey of exploration, there are always some memorable things.

31061.QuestDetail: Try using <style="emph-gn">Monster Detection</style> to find nearby monsters

31063.QuestDetail: There seems to be new progress in the research on the ruins in Asterleeds.

31071.QuestDetail: Valeria received a strange letter, and the sender turned out to be Rab, the mascot of the Seabreeze Festival? To uncover the truth behind it, Valeria has entrusted you to help her investigate...

39001.QuestDetail: Find the Guild manager for a daily check-in.

39002.QuestDetail: Find Douglas to complete a cargo delivery.

39003.QuestDetail: Let's take a look around the Guild together!

110001.QuestDetail: The sea breeze of Asterleeds passes through every street and alley, and through every free heart. The rhythmic melody resounds in the square. At this moment, why not put aside all worries and troubles, and let's swing freely!

120001.QuestDetail: Go to Asteria Plains to check the event location and complete the commission.

130000.QuestDetail:
The parkour track - Beach Gliding is now open, you can go to the registration point to participate in the competition.
This track requires the Floating Glide Terra Resonance ability.

130003.QuestDetail:
Parkour Track - Climb the Giant Tower is now open, you can go to the registration point to participate in the competition.
This track requires the Floating Glide Terra Resonance ability.

180002.QuestDetail: Explore the gathering place where Engrams flow.

180003.QuestDetail: Try to sense the Engram within the Resonant Element. (When in a wind field, use <style="emph-gn">float</style> at certain heights to ride the currents to higher elevations)

180004.QuestDetail: By sensing Engrams, you can observe some special scenes that ordinary people cannot see. Try to use the ability of insight to find the points where Engrams are blocked and restore their normal circulation.

185006.QuestDetail: Encounter the Man in Black at Cliff Ruins

185204.QuestName: The lone boy who braves the flames

185212.QuestDetail: The Void Engram seems to be spreading from nearby, try to find the source.

185601.QuestDetail: Eliminate the Monsters and Protect the Unconscious Airona

185602.QuestDetail: Airona is still unconscious, and at Fafala's invitation, we came to her house to rest for a while...

185606.QuestName: Eliminate the Illusion Flowers in the mine
185606.QuestDetail: Eliminate the Illusion Flowers in the mine

186001.QuestDetail: Griff's caravan and his valuable goods have disappeared, this is not a good sign.

186002.QuestDetail: Griff's caravan and his valuable goods have disappeared, this is not a good sign.

186003.QuestName: Defeat the thugs who kidnapped Nelson
186003.QuestDetail: The council candidate is missing? This is a big deal!

186004.QuestDetail: The council candidate is missing? This is a big deal!

186006.QuestDetail: Someone is buying contraband in Asterleeds market. Find out what's going on.

186007.QuestName: Defeat the monsters guarding the inheritance
186007.QuestDetail: Someone is buying contraband in Asterleeds market. Find out what's going on.

186008.QuestDetail: Poor Bobby was beaten by his fellow scavengers. Try to stop the infighting among the scavengers.

186009.QuestDetail: Poor Bobby was beaten by his fellow scavengers. Try to stop the infighting among the scavengers.

186010.QuestName: Defeat the goblins at the foot of the mountain

186011.QuestDetail: Defeat the suddenly appearing Brigands and protect Sera!

186013.QuestDetail: Defeat the thugs gathered by Daniel

186015.QuestDetail: Adventure and treasure hunting are a man's romance, but abandoning family for it is another matter.

186017.QuestDetail: Camille's grandmother was deceived by someone claiming to be a great witch. Help her out.

186018.QuestDetail: Camille's grandmother was deceived by someone claiming to be a great witch. Help her out.

186019.QuestDetail:
During my exploration, I unexpectedly saved a scholar researching Ee-chan and Ee-chan who was looking for a partner.
At the scholar's request, I took on the task of assisting in finding Ee-chan's partner.

186020.QuestName: Defeat monsters to obtain metal parts
186020.QuestDetail:
During my exploration, I unexpectedly saved a scholar researching Ee-chan and Ee-chan who was looking for a partner.
At the scholar's request, I took on the task of assisting in finding Ee-chan's partner.

186021.QuestDetail: Poor Bobby was beaten by his fellow scavengers. Try to stop the infighting among the scavengers.

186022.QuestDetail: While passing through the goblin tribe, I met a father in distress. His son is suspected to have died in the war. Unable to accept it, he hopes to find a definite answer.

186023.QuestDetail: While passing through the goblin tribe, I met a father in distress. His son is suspected to have died in the war. Unable to accept it, he hopes to find a definite answer.

186024.QuestDetail: While passing through the goblin tribe, I met a father in distress. His son is suspected to have died in the war. Unable to accept it, he hopes to find a definite answer.

186026.QuestName: Escort the convoy to the city gate
186026.QuestDetail: The caravan was attacked by goblins again, protect the caravan through the difficulties.

205012.QuestDetail: "Grey Crow" has finally appeared, find a way to capture him!

205015.QuestDetail: According to Bertram's confession, "Grey Crow" will appear in The Spinning Rudder, and the note from Tina might be a key clue...

310018.QuestDetail: Search the plains for some gatherable items.

500001.QuestDetail: The "Foxtail" restaurant has been open on the Food District of Asterleeds for 10 years. Except for the year during and after the Asterleeds Independence War, people could see Halva hanging the "Open" sign on the door every morning. Halva is the chef and owner of the "Foxtail" restaurant. He is a culinary master with a unique perspective and persistent pursuit of popular cuisine. Despite his age, his passion remains undiminished, and his skills have become even more refined. If you want to learn about Culinary, go ask him!

186025.QuestDetail: Capture Daniel without disturbing the residents

186031.QuestDetail: Adventure and treasure hunting are a man's romance, but abandoning family for it is another matter.

30000.QuestDetail: Airona sent someone to deliver a message, it seems there's some trouble...

170100.QuestDetail: Milia is waiting for adventurers who crave power. Pass her trial to become a Stormblade.

170101.QuestDetail: Milia is waiting for adventurers who crave power. Pass her trial to become a Wind Knight.

170102.QuestDetail: Milia is waiting for adventurers who crave power. Pass her trial to become an Frost Mage.

170103.QuestDetail: Milia is waiting for adventurers who crave power. Pass her trial to become a Marksman.

170104.QuestDetail: Milia is waiting for adventurers who crave power. Pass her trial to become a Verdant Oracle.

170105.QuestDetail: Milia is waiting for adventurers who crave power. Pass her trial to become a Heavy Guardian.

170106.QuestDetail: Milia is waiting for adventurers who crave power. Pass her trial to become a Shield Knight.

170003.QuestDetail: Received a letter from the Adventurer Guild, go talk to Nora...

170004.QuestDetail: A letter from the the Bluewave Anglers invites you to chat at the recruitment center in the Central District.

10503.QuestDetail: Something is happening in Asterleeds. Find someone who knows what's going on.

30116.QuestName: Custom Mount for the Council Member
30116.QuestDetail: There is an eye-catching mount by the roadside...

185501.QuestDetail: The situation has taken an unexpected turn! Try using the Engram Collector to suppress the spread of Void Sigils in Dragon Claw Valley.

30115.QuestDetail: The streetlights outside the city are damaged, assist the Artisan in going out of the city to repair them.

186027.QuestDetail: Defeat the monsters attacking the streetlights.

10501.QuestDetail: Obtained the Engram Collector. Now discuss the next move with your companions.

186028.QuestDetail: Defeat the monsters attracted by the streetlights

10502.QuestDetail: Go with your companions to Minsterhorn to check on the situation of Void Sigils there.

801302.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

801304.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

801306.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

801307.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

801308.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

801309.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

801310.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

801311.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

801312.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

801313.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

801317.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

801328.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

801329.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

802308.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

802309.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

802310.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

802311.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

802312.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

802313.QuestDetail: Collect 6 particles within the time limit

185025.QuestDetail: Someone is buying contraband in Asterleeds market. Find out what's going on.

185026.QuestDetail: Someone is buying contraband in Asterleeds market. Find out what's going on.

185008.QuestDetail: Encounter the Man in Black at Cliff Ruins

170005.QuestDetail: Valeria introduced you to three crucial matters for adventurers. First, let's listen to her detailed explanation about the commission quests from the Pioneer Bureau.

170006.QuestDetail: Complete the trial on the third level of the Trial Path!

10504.QuestDetail: To gather more information about Denvel, seek Tatta's help...

10505.QuestDetail: Head to the Artisan Guild and tell Airona everything. However, the Guild is under a new wave of attacks, defeat the monsters with your companions first.

10506.QuestDetail: Head to the Shrine and prepare to face Denvel.

10508.QuestDetail: The events have temporarily come to a halt, and Asterleeds has entered a period of recuperation. Talk to the people of this city.

20002.QuestDetail: Eliminate 50 goblins and embark on the path of training.

20004.QuestDetail: Eliminate 50 Arachnocrabs of any kind and continue on the path of training.

20006.QuestDetail: Eliminate 50 Brigands of any kind to further improve yourself.

20011.QuestDetail: Defeat the Great Warhog in Windhowl Canyon.

20012.QuestDetail: Eliminate 50 Bzzars in the underground district to continue your training journey.

20013.QuestDetail: Defeat the Void Bzzar in the underground district.

170110.QuestDetail: During their adventure journey, adventurers will encounter various tricky challenges. Mastering different Classes can help them deal with these troubles more easily!

30120.QuestDetail:
Join the parkour challenge with everyone and showcase your excellent parkour skills!
Location: "Parkour Registration Point" next to the "Unit X" Research Facility in Asterleeds
Opening Time: August 31, 19:00~20:00

30121.QuestDetail: A scholar stated that they are conducting a research project on the ecological recovery process after the Asterleeds Independence War.

30118.QuestDetail: The Artisan Seth, who repairs street lamps, has suddenly disappeared. Could it be related to the mysterious heritage he found on the street lamp earlier? Assist Carlisto in investigating.

30125.QuestDetail: The candidate Eddie is preparing a speech for his campaign for councilor, but the speech was blown away by the wind when he went out. Head to Minsterhorn and help him retrieve these scattered manuscripts.

30137.QuestDetail: Several unfriendly-looking thugs are gathered at the door of a house, chatting about something and not allowing outsiders to approach. What are their intentions?

30141.QuestDetail: A fruit stall owner stated that they are facing malicious competition from a nearby fruit store and want to expand their business route, but it seems things are not that simple...

30122.QuestDetail: A generous noble lady is looking for her lost "treasure"...

30136.QuestDetail: A mysterious vendor inadvertently mentioned the term "The Shadow of Bapharian" and pointed out a location. What does it mean? Go and find out...

30123.QuestDetail: The young Artisan Levi found a box left by the former Guildmaster Ted and is eager to open it. He believes it contains the master Artisan's secrets left by Ted. Is it really as he thinks?

30131.QuestName: The Great Adventure! Wonder Cuisine Study Club
30131.QuestDetail: A diner claims to be a member of the "Wonder Cuisine Study Club" and can make uniquely flavored avant-garde dishes, but there is something odd about his words... Anyway, head to the plains and help him collect some materials.

30146.QuestDetail: Guard Ron made a big mistake and let the balloons for shooting practice fly away, which could lead to an accident...

30132.QuestDetail: Scout Scott hasn't replied to his mother Teresa for several days. Help this worried mother find out what's going on.

30126.QuestDetail: In the Asterleeds Defense Corps, the guards are eager to have a match with the adventurers.

30139.QuestDetail: After entering the Ruins of Andra City, Sandro's friend Grace went missing. Take Grace's dog Fido to find him.

30127.QuestDetail: Outside the Ruins of Andra City, a mysterious man seems to be digging the ground non-stop...

30138.QuestDetail: Gary lost his bag at the top of the giant tower, help him retrieve it.

186071.QuestName: Defeat the monster and protect Fido

186072.QuestName: Defeat the monster and protect Fido

30133.QuestName: The courage and patience of wild fishing
30133.QuestDetail:
"Do you know what's most important when fishing in the wild?"
Luya asked calmly with his eyes closed.
He held the fishing rod like a swordsman holding a sword that is his lifeline, without a trace of trembling in his hands...

30134.QuestDetail:
On the vast The Continent of Magna, treasures left by lost civilizations are buried...
At least, that's what the treasure map says.

30149.QuestDetail: The owner of The Double-Faced Coin has sent word through someone that an old acquaintance has a special request for you. Go to the agreed location on Entertainment District and check it out.

30150.QuestDetail: The heir of the "Mermaid," young Meller, has asked you to help collect overdue debts from old customers who haven't come to pay.

10801.QuestDetail: The actual control of the mine has quietly changed hands, and the whole story must be investigated as soon as possible.

30201.QuestDetail: A frightened scholar was found at the entrance of the Flower Valley. After talking, it was learned that he was researching "plants that emit fluorescence" with his companions in the valley. He got lost while searching for samples alone and was surrounded by monsters, thus trapped here.

10802.QuestName: Fully awake but to no avail
10802.QuestDetail: The Blackstone Legion is divided, and former loyalists are no longer trustworthy, while the truth is hidden in layers of fog.

10803.QuestDetail: The conspiracy finally reveals the tip of the iceberg, and in the power struggle, some still remain true to themselves. Go find those rebels.

10804.QuestDetail: The illegal mining of Ruby has long existed. What is hidden behind this shady smuggling, and what waves will be stirred by the Hruga's Horn brought to the plateau?

10805.QuestName: Light drops into the deepest part of my eyes
10805.QuestDetail: While clarifying the source of the Ruby, it is equally crucial to prevent this dangerous material from flowing out of the mine.

10806.QuestName: Walk along the wall of non-poetry
10806.QuestDetail: The rebel leader tainted with Hruga's aura complicates matters further, and the miners' situation becomes more dangerous. The narrower the path, the more carefully it must be traversed.

10807.QuestDetail: After finding the outflow channel of the Ruby, the final piece of this puzzle is finally completed. However, upon returning to the underground mining area, what awaits is an empty sorting area...

10808.QuestDetail: In turbulent times, the differences between people are magnified, but fortunately, Grieg unites miners of different positions and identities. However, reaching a consensus is just the beginning of action, not the end.

10809.QuestName: Black stirs a storm in the eyes
10809.QuestDetail: Taking the first step to confront the Blackstone Legion, but it was unsuccessful, so they had to return to find Grieg and ask if there was an alternative plan.

10810.QuestDetail: The epic of heroes should not be built on the sacrifice of the innocent. To protect the miners of the Sislesa Mine, it is necessary to return to Asterleeds and request more forces to intervene.

10811.QuestName: Transparently passing through the years like glass
10811.QuestDetail: For various considerations, Lamond does not want Asterleeds to openly confront the The Duchy of Byrnhald. However, there is still a chance. Perhaps by changing the approach, the goal can still be achieved.

30203.QuestDetail: An elderly person from Jennifer's family has gone missing. Fortunately, they shouldn't have gone far. Ask around the neighborhood and bring the elderly person back home.

30204.QuestDetail: After accepting Jennifer's commission, I inquired with everyone who might know Roy's whereabouts. Finally, I found a clue from Valeria: Roy had once gone on a mission with a forest expedition team.

30209.QuestDetail: In the camp of Duskdye Woods , a hungry adventurer looks extremely tired...

30202.QuestDetail: Another scholar has requested to investigate the strange buzzing sound in the valley. According to his research, the monsters in the valley might be fighting for territory because of this buzzing sound.

30208.QuestDetail: While exploring the Everfall Forest, a torn diary page was discovered. The handwriting, still crisp and unweathered, revealed that someone had become lost in this place, desperately searching for a way home. Just then, the sharp barking of dogs echoed in the distance, hinting that something was unfolding nearby...

186102.QuestName: Defeat the monster in front of you

186103.QuestName: Defeat the monster in front of you

30210.QuestDetail: The archaeologist Hills from Byrnhaldt wanders around the Ruins of Andra City all day, as if searching for the time that has passed...

185009.QuestDetail: Intercept Abeku in the back alley

30205.QuestDetail: Finally learned from Bell about Roy's disappearance. Useful clues should be found within the exploration team's activity range at that time.

10510.QuestDetail: Everything will eventually settle. Head to Dark Mist Fortress and sever the chains of evil.

10511.QuestDetail: The Void Mist has engulfed Dark Mist Fortress. In the desperate moment, Tina unleashed the power of the Core of Stellarium. The light of Engram saved everyone. But a heavy price was paid...

30211.QuestDetail:
"Every beat of my pulse is proof of your existence."
The latest controversial work by a famous continental author!
A love waltz co-written by humans and dragons!

185510.QuestDetail: Help Jerrad and Asterleeds Defense Corps fend off the Dark Mist Legion's attack!

30212.QuestDetail: You received a mysterious card full of typos, inviting you to meet near the brewery in Port Town...

185515.QuestDetail: Go to the Pioneer Bureau to find Tatta, but an unexpected situation occurs on site...

185516.QuestDetail: Together with Tina, find Tatta outside the chaotic Pioneer Bureau. He brings clues to the last Void Sigil.

185520.QuestDetail: Discuss the next steps with your companions in the face of the threat from the last Void Sigil.

185525.QuestDetail: Go to the final battleground with your companions before everything becomes irreversible.

185526.QuestDetail: The moment of destiny is near. Destroy the last Void Sigil and stop Denvel's conspiracy.

185530.QuestDetail: The moment of destiny is near. Destroy the last Void Sigil and stop Denvel's conspiracy.

185505.QuestDetail: Talk to the girl who appeared in the village and try to use the Engram Collector to suppress the spread of the Void Sigil in Minsterhorn.

10513.QuestDetail: Asterleeds' adventure draws to a close, and hidden memories will guide you into the next journey.

10701.QuestDetail: Darya has returned to the mine, and the next issue is how to obtain a large number of Star Soul Bottles.

10702.QuestDetail: The pilgrims are holding a lively gathering, maybe you can find clues on how to obtain a large number of Star Soul Bottles here.

10703.QuestName: Seeping into the Earth Like Gentle Rain
10703.QuestDetail: Go with Boyce to find 1st Class Priest Lothar to discuss changes in the mining area and obtain support for Star Soul Bottles.

10706.QuestName: Drinking the Truth and Lies of the Tide

10707.QuestName: Beneath the Mountain Mustard, a Heart of Stone

10708.QuestName: Dreams of Returning Home on the Plateau

10709.QuestName: Dreams of Returning Home on the Plateau

30300.QuestName: The Secret Whispered in the Wind
30300.QuestDetail: Assist the leader of the scholar group, Smith, in surveying the relics left by past civilizations in the ruins. Restore and reconstruct the deeply buried history in the Windhowl Canyon.

30311.QuestDetail: Documents in the scholar camp's archives often go missing unexpectedly. Assist the manager, James, in investigating.

30301.QuestDetail: Assist Destinee in searching for the rampaging machines and reclaiming the Miracle Heritage, Tear of Mordia

20020.QuestName: Borrow the name from Sea breeze
20020.QuestDetail: On the beach, a pair of twin sisters are having an incredible conversation, go check it out

30312.QuestDetail: The Smelting Grayson in the camp seems to be pestered by his apprentice, what is going on...

30302.QuestName: The eternal sound of chanting among the clouds
30302.QuestDetail: Collect information hidden in the ruins and uncover the truth of the Modia Egg.

30313.QuestName: Set Off! Scholar Group's Canyon Ruins Exploration!
30313.QuestDetail: The scholar group in Asterleeds is recruiting reliable adventurers to conduct exploration activities in Windhowl Canyon. Get detailed information from the leader, Smith.

30314.QuestDetail: The scholar group's philologist Charlie is standing by a cliff, seemingly collecting some strange ancient texts...

30315.QuestDetail: The security captain of the Merchant Camp, Barry, seems very troubled. It is said that the camp has been targeted...

30401.QuestDetail: You received an unsigned letter inviting you to visit the shadow side of Asterleeds, the "Underground District."

30206.QuestDetail: Roy's disappearance seems to be related to a person named Ryan. Investigate around him.

30207.QuestDetail: Everything is ready, it's time to bring things to a close. Now, all that's left is to bring Swindler to justice!

170007.QuestDetail: Regnus is rich in natural resources, including plants, fungi, animals, minerals, and more. Some people, through experience and research, find and collect these natural resources in a reasonable manner, while others process the collected resources into various items useful for life and combat. This is what is known as a Life Skill.

30402.QuestName: Embark on the path to promotion?
30402.QuestDetail: Follow the guidance of the Hobos' leader and head to the connecting passage between Zone 1 and Zone 2 to find the contact person of the Floating Party.

186404.QuestName: Negotiate with the leader of the Floating Party

186405.QuestName: Act with the leader of the Floating Party

170008.QuestDetail: Sid is a renowned phytologist in Regnus. Almost every adventurer owns a copy of his book "The Magical Plants of Regnus." Whether it's for stopping external bleeding or pain relief and detoxification, if you've read his book, you can always find the corresponding plants in the wild. Go ask him about Botany.

170009.QuestDetail: The "Golden Spirit" prospecting team is the first prospecting team officially recognized by Asterleeds, mainly undertaking prospecting commissions from Asterleeds officials and the Pioneer Bureau. As the first leader of the prospecting team, Aile has retired from the front line and now stays in the city to teach young people who are just getting into prospecting. Be careful, he is very strict.

170010.QuestDetail: With the emergence of Gemology and Gemcrafting, members of the "Golden Spirit" Prospecting Team led by Safia concluded that clinging to traditional methods would result in stagnation. They departed to form the "Brilliant Crystals" Research Team. Safiya is likely the most knowledgeable person about crystals in all of Asterleeds. Speak with her to learn about Gemology.

170011.QuestDetail: The Artisan Guild claims that with the ancient relic "Orb Refining Device," they can create many items beneficial for adventuring. Go to the Artisan Guild to learn more.

170012.QuestDetail: The Artisan Guild intends to teach adventurers a technique for forging using relics. By processing metal ores, they can create materials that greatly aid in adventures. Go to the second floor of the Artisan Guild and ask relic expert Gary about it.

30320.QuestDetail: Head to Zone 3, complete the quest assigned by the Floating Party boss, and find the councilor.

170014.QuestDetail: The Imagine Research Institute has developed a new technique called "Alchemy." It is said that it can not only create various powerful potions but also many interesting tools. Go to the Imagine Research Institute to learn more.

186410.QuestName: Teach a lesson to the Robber Gang members

30404.QuestName: Dawn emerging from the core of the earth
30404.QuestDetail: Learn the truth from Wally and make a choice...

186412.QuestName: Defeat the combination of Scorpion and Dumb Hammer

30316.QuestName: The true and false ship spirit
30316.QuestDetail: Is there really a ship spirit on the Andra?

30319.QuestDetail: At the entrance of the Skimmer's Lair, a young man dressed as a scholar shivers as he looks at the area ahead

30501.QuestDetail: Traveler Uncle Zack has posted a commission, seemingly related to an underwater cave...

30502.QuestName: To the city where the sea breeze blows
30502.QuestDetail: In the depths of the underwater cave, a strange girl is waiting, seemingly in need of help.

30505.QuestName: Thousand Flowers Story - Cobalt Sea Lily
30505.QuestDetail:
With the discovery of the underwater cave, adventurers, scholars, merchants, fishermen, and others from Asterleeds flocked in, fearing they would miss the opportunity to change their lives if they were a step too late.
An area never before revealed to the world promises great rewards but also comes with great risks.
Botanist Sid feels somewhat troubled by this...

10012.QuestDetail: At dusk, you head to the beach for an appointment and join Airona for the fireworks festival. What kind of memories will you create on this night woven with stars and fireworks?

30410.QuestDetail: It seems that someone in the underground district needs to make a strengthening potion but is struggling to gather the materials. Go and check it out.

30408.QuestDetail: Erwin, the leader of the Artisan Guild energy team, is troubled and hopes someone can go to the sewers to see what is wrong with Asterleeds' energy network.

30411.QuestDetail: The eerie atmosphere of the sewers has attracted many curious individuals, including the Riddler... It is said that solving the Riddler's twisted riddles will yield generous rewards. Is it true?

170001.QuestDetail: There is a dividing line between adventurers of the same Class, and that is the choice of <style="emph-gn">Class paths</style>. Go ask Airona for her advice on this!

30409.QuestDetail: Food sources in the underground world have always been a major issue. A gang member, unable to bear the hunger, came up with the idea of raising Boarriers. However, he seems to have encountered some minor troubles...

31062.QuestDetail: They possess far greater Stamina and a myriad of attack methods compared to adventurers. Each one is the king of their own tribe, and they are called <style="emph-gn">bosses</style> by adventurers.

20014.QuestDetail: Eliminate 50 storm Goblins in Windhowl Canyon.

20015.QuestDetail: Defeat the Storm Goblin Warriors in Windhowl Canyon.

20016.QuestDetail: Eliminate 50 Shadow Scout and Radical Shadow Gunners on the outskirts of Ruins of Andra City.

20017.QuestDetail: Defeat the Shadow Captain on the outskirts of Ruins of Andra City ("It's almost over, I swear." - Airona)

20018.QuestDetail: Eliminate 50 Radical Shadow Wardens and Shadow Blade inside Ruins of Andra City to face the final test.

20019.QuestDetail:
Defeat the Shadow Commander inside Ruins of Andra City.
The end of training is the beginning of a new journey.

30506.QuestDetail: It is said that the Lamp Genie visits the Statue of the Hero every day, lighting the lamps beside the sculptures to guide the souls of heroes.

30151.QuestDetail: Pale Azure Lake is located in the northern part of Asteria Plains, near the Kanamia Forest. It is famous for its light blue water and abundant fish. After completing the project "Ecological Monitoring and Water Quality Survey of the Landing Battle Site," scholar Kaibo shifted his research focus to the ecological monitoring of Pale Azure Lake...

10300.QuestDetail: Returning to Asterleeds, you reunite with old friends and make a new promise.

30507.QuestDetail: Unexpectedly rescued a soldier in distress at the edge of the Statue of the Hero cliff. His purpose for being here is...

10402.QuestDetail: Following Rorola's lead, you arrive at the Wander Site of the Kanamian. The final key is hidden somewhere within the Wander Site.

30508.QuestDetail: Behind a tree near the Ancient City of Vill is hiding a young man, secretly watching the goblins in the distance.

30500.QuestDetail: A noisy group has arrived at the Pioneers' Guild. It seems there's a tricky problem waiting to be solved... What could it be?

30511.QuestName: To the Sea! Experimental Cuisine Club!
30511.QuestDetail: The opening of the Skimmer's Lair has attracted many groups to explore, including the Experimental Cuisine Club. But it seems they've run into some serious trouble...

170015.QuestDetail: Talk to Maxim from the Artisan Guild to learn about Reforge.

30517.QuestDetail: A young girl exploring the Skimmer's Lair claims she's in a bit of trouble and needs an adventurer. What's going on exactly?

170016.QuestDetail: Talk to Maxim from the Artisan Guild to learn about Gear Refinement.

30509.QuestDetail: Members of the Black Cat Tour Group have also arrived at the Skimmer's Lair to expand their tourism routes, but it looks like they've run into serious trouble...

30516.QuestDetail: A merchant has discovered a new use for anemones: making painkillers. But the workers collecting the anemones seem to be slowing down. Are they slacking off, or is there something else going on?

170017.QuestDetail: Talk to Maxim from the Artisan Guild to learn about Embed.

186504.QuestName: Overcome the phantom and return to reality

30521.QuestDetail: I received a strange letter, inviting me to meet somewhere in the Skimmer's Lair... Should I go check it out?

30601.QuestDetail: The truth buried in Windhowl Canyon: the traitorous assistant Misty, the elusive poacher, the still-active divine relics among the ruins, and the seemingly protective machine... What is the real story?

30303.QuestDetail: Smith's apprentice, Esmeralda, is trying to investigate the ecological cycle in Windhowl Canyon. What exactly is causing the animals to riot?

30317.QuestDetail: Misty and Smith are discussing the location for the second campsite. Where should it be?

30703.QuestDetail: A group of Scavengers is recruiting adventurers to escort them to the mysterious "Duskdye Woods ." Although the invitation is worded a bit oddly, it might be worth investigating.

30701.QuestName: A dead monster is a good monster
30701.QuestDetail: Nearby caravans have been repeatedly attacked by monsters. Investigations reveal that the local monsters are responsible. Join the guards to eliminate the monsters entrenched here.

30602.QuestDetail: Food has been repeatedly stolen from the Scavenger camp. Who is responsible?

30215.QuestDetail: The Everfall Forest, known for its perpetual rainfall, was once home to the Scavengers-until a rise in monster activity compelled them to abandon the camp they built with their own hands. Now, they are determined to reclaim their home - go and lend them a hand.

30702.QuestDetail: A young man has reportedly been seen held captive by Goblins. We should check it out.

186420.QuestName: The food-stealing Goblin has finally shown itself.

30216.QuestDetail: To protect this camp, the Scavengers must deal with the nearby monster infestations. Help Alex resolve this imminent threat.

30214.QuestDetail: Wilhelmina says the water source in the camp is often polluted. The culprit turns out to be a cunning goblin. Figure something out.

30413.QuestName: The Dark Side of the Moon
30413.QuestDetail: A collector in the sewers seems urgently in need of someone to handle a rare underground ritual, a funeral.

30213.QuestDetail: A scholar needs help gathering materials for her research. Give her a hand.

30603.QuestDetail: Matthew at the Merchant Camp seems to be recruiting a capable adventurer, but he has some strange requirements. What could be the problem?

30604.QuestDetail: Three geology scholars from the Scholar Camp have been missing all day. Help find them.

30605.QuestDetail: In the Scholar Camp, apprentice Albert and his mentor Grayson are once again arguing about surveying the canyon ruins. Maybe you can help mediate.

30606.QuestDetail: Misty stole the letter opener. Albert couldn't complete his experimental project and felt upset. Grayson may have a way to reignite his motivation...

186423.QuestName: Assist Destinee in defeating the Golem

10901.QuestName: Gods Closed Their Eyes at This Moment

10902.QuestName: How the Clouds Part to Reveal the Sun

30704.QuestDetail: Several children have recently vanished in the Duskdye Woods . Search teams have come up empty-handed, and people are worried. But now, a man claiming to be a detective says he can find them...

30609.QuestDetail: A cry for help echoes in a narrow tunnel. What's going on?

30217.QuestDetail: Tristrom and Zeke are arguing again. What's it about this time?

186122.QuestName: Pose as a Child to Be the Bait

30510.QuestDetail: A young man named Ryan is recruiting help to search for undersea treasure. What kind of treasure could be worth all the trouble?

30218.QuestDetail: Bad news has spread through the camp... What happened?

30607.QuestDetail: Zeke is currently searching for individuals to locate the scavengers lost in the Everfall Forest. It's believed that these scavengers may be in grave danger and need to be found immediately. Lend a hand to Zeke!

30608.QuestDetail: Staff from the Pioneer Bureau are looking for adventurers to help test a new device. Go see what it's about.

30705.QuestDetail: A mushroom merchant from Asterleeds wants to explore the dangerous forest. Lend him a hand!

30706.QuestDetail: Staff from the Pioneer Bureau are looking for adventurers to help test a new device. Go see what it's about.

30610.QuestDetail: Word is that the Kanamians prefer bartering over using Luno.

30153.QuestDetail: On a hill near Minsterhorn, someone appears troubled by something.

170107.QuestDetail: Milia is waiting for an adventurer seeking power. Pass her trial to become a Beat Performer.

170018.QuestDetail: Valeria wants to introduce you to the activity system and Honor Coins. Go talk to her to learn more.

30612.QuestDetail: The beginning, the origin, the start-call it what you will. It's the story of those people, a tale of love and adventure.

30611.QuestDetail: Scholar or Fisher? Two people tired of their current lives meet. What choices will they make?

30152.QuestDetail: Near the entrance of the Skimmer's Lair, a young man appears to be injured.

30708.QuestDetail: To catch the culprit who killed Malorie, the Scavenger Camp has mobilized all resources and set up an ambush near the ruins. They've even brought in an artisan expert for support. Will they catch the killer?

30613.QuestDetail: The beginning, the origin, the start-call it what you will. It's the story of those people, a tale of love and adventure.

170019.QuestDetail: Artisanry is an ancient skill passed down through generations. People design and process various types of wood into furniture and other items, building their dream homes piece by piece. Once, there was a renowned master carpenter in Asterleeds who led the post-war reconstruction. Perhaps due to his age or the toll of the demanding work, he passed away after getting the city through the toughest time. His adopted son, also his apprentice, took over his work. Go find Cicero to learn more about Artisanry.

170020.QuestDetail: Spin the wool of Caprahorns into yarn, extract plant pigments to make natural dyes, and weave dyed yarns into carpets with intricate patterns... Each beautiful carpet involves a complex process. If you want to learn more about weaving, go talk to Maina.

30161.QuestName: Blessing of the Stars and Sea Breeze
30161.QuestDetail: A mysterious voice seems to call out to you from above.

30162.QuestName: Oath of Sea Breeze and Fireworks
30162.QuestDetail: On Asterleeds beach, a girl smiles at you.

30163.QuestDetail: At the food festival, citizens dance around the stage.

30165.QuestDetail: A kind priest looks at you.

30164.QuestDetail: A well-dressed gentleman looks at you.

185804.QuestName: Investigate the distribution channels for the Rubys

185807.QuestName: Follow the trail left by Darya

171001.QuestDetail:
The Council assigns a personal agent to each Ocean Platinum Card holder to handle related matters.
Now, it's time to meet your exclusive agent.

171002.QuestDetail:
Agent Connor... or rather, now Butler Connor.
Butler Connor will give me a tour of this private island that belongs to me only. Let's go take a look.

30177.QuestDetail: Submit the required materials to Gaido for generous rewards.

30178.QuestDetail: Submit the required materials to Gaido for generous rewards.

30179.QuestDetail: Submit the required materials to Gaido for generous rewards.

30180.QuestDetail: Submit the required materials to Gaido for generous rewards.

30181.QuestDetail: Submit the required materials to Gaido for generous rewards.

30182.QuestDetail: Submit the required materials to Gaido for generous rewards.

30183.QuestDetail: Submit the required materials to Gaido for generous rewards.

30184.QuestDetail: Submit the required materials to Gaido for generous rewards.

30185.QuestDetail: Submit the required materials to Gaido for generous rewards.

171003.QuestDetail: Everything's great in the homestead, except the house feels too small... Maybe Connor knows how to expand it?

171004.QuestDetail: The new house is nice, but it could be more spacious... Connor might be able to help!

171005.QuestDetail: The island's usable space is a bit small... Ask Connor when the other areas will open.

171006.QuestDetail: If you want to visit other parts of the island, continue the second phase of expansion... Check with Connor on the progress.

171007.QuestName: Can We Expand the Space Even More?!
171007.QuestDetail: Connor can help with anything related to the homestead, including the third phase of island expansion.

50001.QuestDetail:
A true master never stops pushing their limits. During the event period, conquer Master Dungeons of the Chaotic Realm and accumulate 2,000 points to complete the trial!
Quest Duration: active during Master's Trial: Scorching Warfare

171008.QuestDetail: A Homestead Crafting Station has already been placed in your home. Let's use it to create your first furniture now!

171009.QuestDetail: Connor's Quick Tips: A Novice Guide to Homestead Farming- 1. Purchase seeds: Seeds can be purchased from Homestead Merchant Delphine. 2. Plant the seeds: Approach the soil and sow your favorite seeds. Water the seeds you planted. 3. Harvest and profit: Once the crops are fully grown, harvest and sell them! Enjoy your peaceful farming time on the island!

171010.QuestDetail: Talk to Butler Connor to learn about and complete a Homestead commission.

171011.QuestDetail: Keep adding new facilities to increase your Homestead Level!

171012.QuestDetail: Speak with Butler Connor to learn how to rearrange and decorate your Homestead layout.

171013.QuestDetail: Talk to Sophia the Maid and try accessing the Homestead Warehouse once.

50002.QuestDetail:
Hughie seems to have an urgent task for you. A mysterious Bapharian Relic has been discovered on the Floating Island. Researchers are investigating on-site.
The Legacy is believed to hold unimaginable power...
Quest time limit: Sanctum of the Chained Dragon - Adept's Training event

50003.QuestDetail:
The Legacy on the Floating Island has been activated. Thalia claims it connects to a mysterious Floating Island.
Through the Legacy, the silhouette of the island can faintly be seen. Deep within, there could be ancient dragons slumbering...
It's time to uncover the truth of this unknown land!

50005.QuestDetail: Go to Floating Island - Dragon Shackles to defeat RinIzcorgiky in any difficulty!

50006.QuestDetail: Go to Floating Island- Dragon Shackles to defeat BoneXiolotl in any difficulty!

50007.QuestDetail: Go to Floating Island - Dragon Shackles to defeat LightTonatiuh in any difficulty!

50008.QuestDetail:
Limited Event Skill Reset has started! Find Milia at the Pioneer Bureau to learn about it.
From now to September 14th, 2025, at 23:59 (UTC-2)
